sentences.en: A 56 - pass cell is constructed for Ti : sapphire ring laser photoacoustic spectrometer.
sentences.cn: 制成适用于钛宝石激光光声光谱仪的光56次通过的长程池.

sentences.en: A continuous wave titanium - doped sapphire laser pumped by argon laser is :'reported.
sentences.cn: 本文报导一种连续波氩离子 激光泵浦 的掺钛蓝宝石激光器.

sentences.en: Case: 18 K rose gold, transparent back, sapphire crystal glass.
sentences.cn: 表壳: 18K玫瑰金, 透视底盖, 蓝宝石水晶玻璃.

sentences.en: First, this is becomes with natural and the field sapphire carefulmanufacture.
sentences.cn: 一 、 本品是用天然和田青玉精心制作而成.

sentences.en: He gave his girlfriend a sapphire engagement ring.
sentences.cn: 他送给女友一枚镶着蓝宝石的订婚戒指。

sentences.en: He left a sapphire ring to her.
sentences.cn: 他留给她一枚蓝宝石戒指.

sentences.en: Next spring I can bring you a ruby and a sapphire.
sentences.cn: 明年春天,我将带回给你一颗红宝石和一颗蓝宝石.

sentences.en: Now let us consider crystals such as diamond or sapphire.
sentences.cn: 现在让我们考虑象钻石和蓝宝石这样的晶体.

sentences.en: One of the new Sapphire Gold brooder, aged about 4 years.
sentences.cn: 一尾大约四岁的新蓝宝石紫蓝底过背金种鱼.

sentences.en: Sapphire and faded jeans, hope you get your dreams.
sentences.cn: 穿上你最爱的褪色牛仔裤祝你美梦成真.

sentences.en: Sapphire and YAG were compared as the material of CPC.
sentences.cn: 在聚光器材料的选择上,比较了蓝宝石和YAG晶体.

sentences.en: Sapphire is an ideal, multispectral and broadband window material.
sentences.cn: 蓝宝石是一种极为理想的多光谱宽波段窗口材料.

sentences.en: She had the sapphire set in a gold ring.
sentences.cn: 她把那枚蓝宝石镶在金戒指上了.

sentences.en: So, with its cloudy walls of chrysolite, jasper, and sapphire.
sentences.cn: 于是, 镶嵌橄榄石, 碧玉, 蓝宝石的云墙中间.

sentences.en: Zhong Tianqi would get me the sapphire on the cost of life.
sentences.cn: 以前的仲天骐就算赔上性命也会帮我找到那颗蓝宝石.
